properties.name: photo-archive.in-folder
properties.description: folder for storing all input files.

properties.name: photo-archive.duplicate-folder
properties.description: folder for storing files with same hash.

properties.name: photo-archive.processing-folder
properties.description: folder for storing files for processing.

properties.name: photo-archive.manual-folder
properties.description: folder for storing files without GEO information and manual distribution.

properties.name: photo-archive.google-api-key
properties.description: API Google key for reverse GEO code.

properties.name: photo-archive.default-language
properties.description: Language for request addresses from google and for resolving month names.

properties.name: photo-archive.forbidden-folder-symbols-regex
properties.description: Regex: Forbidden characters for naming folders. All symbols, filtered by regex, will be truncated. It is forbidden to define symbols: ' '(space), '-' and '_'.

properties.name: photo-archive.processing-load-delay-in-milliseconds
properties.description: Delay for scheduler robot service scaner.

properties.name: photo-archive.processing-initial-load-delay-in-milliseconds
properties.description: Initial delay for scheduler robot service scaner.

properties.name: photo-archive.processing-tick-delay-in-milliseconds
properties.description: Delay for scheduler robot service tick.

properties.name: photo-archive.processing-initial-tick-delay-in-milliseconds
properties.description: Initial delay for scheduler robot service tick.
